title: Roadblocks around President’s Office
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police say that roadblocks have been set up at the entrances to the by roads around the President’s Office.
Accordingly, roadblocks have been set up from Ceramic Junction to NAS Roundabout in Colombo.
The Inter University Students Federation is scheduled to hold a protest in Colombo this afternoon (24), and they stated that the protest march will commence from Colombo Fort.
